main-thread-stack-size.help: The size of the main thread's stack

timer-thread-stack-size.help: The size of the timer thread's stack

idle-thread-stack-size.help: The size of the idle thread's stack

thread-stack-size.help: The default stack size of new threads

idle-thread-stack-size-tickless-extra.help: Additional size to add to the idle thread when a specific target or application implementation requires it or in case tickless is enabled and LPTICKER_DELAY_TICKS is used

idle-thread-stack-size-debug-extra.help: Additional size to add to the idle thread when code compilation optimisation is disabled
